appBanner.message: Please check your inbox and spam folder for the e-mail that we sent to you. Follow the instructions in the e-mail. If you have not received it within 20 minutes of signing up, recover your account.
appBanner.title: Your account is not verified.

authErrors.genericError: The action could not be completed

authView.consentSubtitle: * All the data you contribute to MapSwipe is open and available to anyone. Your username is public, but your e-mail and password will never be shared with anyone.
authView.followInstructionOnYourEmail: Please follow the instructions sent to your e-mail. It may take up to 20 minutes for the e-mail to arrive.
authView.noUppercase: Your username cannot contain uppercase letters.
authView.osmSignInSuccess: You are signed in with OpenStreetMap.
authView.osmSignInError: Sorry, we did not manage to sign you in with OpenStreetMap.
authView.signInOsmText: You can sign in to MapSwipe using your OpenStreetMap account. If you already have a MapSwipe account, this will not link them together! (this will come soon in a future release)

homeView.title: Welcome to the MapSwipe web app!
homeView.text: As part of the Missing Map project, {mapswipeLink} was created to crowdsource map data from a network of global volunteers - just one swipe at a time. Individuals, volunteers from communities all over the world, can find crucial infrastructure such as buildings and roads, identify changes in areas. In addition to the {mobileAppLink}, volunteers can now use the new MapSwipe web app and start contributing right away through a web browser on various devices.
homeView.acknowledgement: The web app was initially developed by {heigitLink} with the support of the {hotLink}. If you find a bug or want to request a feature, please {issueLink} on GitHub.

profileView.AreYouSureYouWantToSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?
profileView.AreYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone!
profileView.AreYouSureYouWantToJoin: Are you sure you want to join this group?
profileView.AreYouSureYouWantToLeave: Are you sure you want to leave this group?

projectView.AreYouSureYouWantToLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the project? Your contributions will be lost.
projectView.checkConnection: Check your internet connection and browser settings to make sure that contents can be loaded
projectView.resultsSaved: Thanks, {user}! Your contribution has been saved.
projectView.youHaveCompletedAllTheTasks: Do you want to continue mapping in this project or go back to see all the projects?
projectView.goBackToProjects: Well done,  {user}!  There is nothing left to do for you here. Please have a look at our other projects.

findProject.moveRight: Move right by one column | Move right by {n} columns
findProject.moveLeft: Move left by one column | Move left by {n} columns
findProject.removedFromSelection: One tile removed from selection | {n} tiles removed from selection

projectInstructions.classifyInstruction: Use buttons to provide your answers
projectInstructions.dontWorry: Don't worry if you are not sure
projectInstructions.everyTaskIsViewedBy: Every task is viewed by several MapSwipers, so it's ok if you think you missed something
projectInstructions.seenAll: as soon as you have seen and classified all images
projectInstructions.toggleOpacityInstruction: For a clearer view of the underlying imagery, toggle the opacity of the overlay
projectInstructions.whereIamInstruction: Open a map of where you are currently contributing

findProjectInstructions.classifyInstruction: Click or tap each image tile, until the appropriate answer appears
findProjectInstructions.selectTile: ... or right click/hold touch to add a tile to the selection. Repeat to remove the tile from the selection
findProjectInstructions.selectAll: Select all tiles in view. Repeat to clear selection
findProjectInstructions.selectionInstruction: Any click to classify applies to all selected tiles
findProjectInstructions.magnifyInstruction: Click this icon in the upper right corner of a tile to magnify the image

validateProjectInstructions.seenAll: as soon as you have seen and classified all the features.

streetProject.couldNotLoadImage: Sorry, we could not load this image.

projectTutorial.completionDescription: You're now equipped with all you need to contribute to humanitarian mapping using the app. You can come back anytime for refresher.
